summary: Defense spending amounted to $714 billion in FY 2020—and is expected to increase to $733 billion in FY 2021. We testified about ways that DOD can better manage defense spending. For instance, DOD could more clearly determine resource needs related to overseas contingency operations. DOD could also strengthen its efforts to avoid payment errors—the agency made about $11.4 billion in payment errors in 2020. DOD...
title: Defense Budget: Opportunities Exist to Improve DOD's Management of Defense Spending
